channel.title: TeleBlock
channel.description:
ok well i was in wilderness pking and i teleblocked someone and it doesn't always work i was wondering why this would be i'm using deltascape.
Does teleblock not work on toX toY things ?

item.title: TeleBlock
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

In client i found 2 of them here they are:

if (MagicHandler.itTeleblocks && !splash) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTeleblock >= 300000) { mage.sM("You have been teleblocked!"); server.playerHandler.players[index].lastTeleblock = System.currentTimeMillis(); } }

if (!MagicHandler.itTeleblocks && !splash) { server.playerHandler.players[index].dealDamage(hitDiff); server.playerHandler.players[index].hitDiff = hitDiff; server.playerHandler.players[index].updateRequired = true; server.playerHandler.players[index].hitUpdateRequired = true; server.playerHandler.players[index].KilledBy[playerId] += hitDiff; server.playerHandler.players[index].offTimer = System.currentTimeMillis(); server.playerHandler.players[index].hitID = playerId; mage.KillerId = playerId; } } } catch (Exception e) { } }

Read full topic

item.title: TeleBlock
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Hmm. Try posting your teleblock on player code.

Read full topic

item.title: TeleBlock
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

I know that but even when it doesn’t splash it doesn’t tb them like if one player is Tb’d it won’t tb someone else

Read full topic

item.title: TeleBlock
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

That’s because DeltaScape has magic splashes like RuneScape. Some magic spells fail depending on bonuses.

Read full topic
